name: Piling Priorities
description:
Piling Priorities is a game is a simple mouse based game where you have to complete tasks within a time limit to keep your job. There are currently five types of tasks:

- A small maze where you have to drag the red dot to the finish.

- A simple math problem thats multiple choice.

- A set of four coloured buttons where you have to identify the key word and press it.

- A set of four squares that you have to put in order of size.

- A button you have to click enough times before time is up.

Controls:

- Right click to drag tasks

- Left click to complete tasks

This game attempts to help people who suffer from poor time management by helping them realise the way of setting goals for time can help their determination to start work.
